name: Think Inside The Box (TheTrueDuck, GREG_LP, AnnCabras)
name_original: Think Inside The Box (TheTrueDuck, GREG_LP, AnnCabras)
description:
Solve some Rubik's-cube puzzles but from the inside!

Strive for the fastest time and smallest number of moves!

Convince your alien abductors that you are not stupid!
